attributes.action: Bring back our soldiers back from a pointless war in Afganistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should all our hereoic soldiers keep being killed in Afghanistan, so young for a pointless war that is no closer to being resolved dispite what politicians say. Bring them back and let them be with their families and defend the homeland, without being blown up by maniacs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
